description: Fabber - a flexible BaYesian modeling framework for FMRI and MRI analysis.

data.title: Input Data File
data.description: Specify a single input data file

data_n.title: Additional Data Files
data_n.description: Specify multiple data files for n=1, 2, 3...

data_order.title: Data Order Handling
data_order.description: If multiple data files are specified, how they will be handled: concatenate = one after the other,  interleave = first record from each file, then  second, etc.

mask.title: Mask File
mask.description: Mask file. Inference will only be performed where mask value > 0

mt_n.title: Masked Time Points
mt_n.description: List of masked time points, indexed from 1. These will be ignored in the parameter updates

suppdata.title: Supplemental Timeseries Data
suppdata.description: 'Supplemental' timeseries data, required for some models

listparams.title: List Parameters
listparams.description: List model parameters (requires model configuration options to be given)

descparams.title: Describe Parameters
descparams.description: Descript model parameters (name, description, units) - requires model configuration options to be given. Note that not all models provide parameter descriptions

listoutputs.title: List Outputs
listoutputs.description: List additional model outputs (requires model configuration options to be given)

evaluate.title: Evaluate Model
evaluate.description: Evaluate model. Set to name of output required or blank for default output. Requires model configuration options, --evaluate-params and --evaluate-nt

evaluate_params.title: Evaluation Parameters
evaluate_params.description: List of parameter values for evaluation

evaluate_nt.title: Number of Time Points for Evaluation
evaluate_nt.description: Number of time points for evaluation - must be consistent with model options where appropriate

simple_output.title: Simple Output
simple_output.description: Instead of usual standard output, simply output series of lines each giving progress as percentage

overwrite.title: Overwrite Output
overwrite.description: If set will overwrite existing output. If not set, new output directories will be created by appending '+' to the directory name

link_latest.title: Link to Latest
link_latest.description: Try to create a link to the most recent output directory with the prefix _latest

loadmodels.title: Load Models File
loadmodels.description: Load models dynamically from the specified filename, which should be a DLL/shared library

dump_param_names.title: Dump Parameter Names
dump_param_names.description: Write the file paramnames.txt containing the names of the model parameters

save_model_fit.title: Save Model Fit
save_model_fit.description: Output the model prediction as a 4d volume

save_residuals.title: Save Residuals
save_residuals.description: Output the residuals (difference between the data and the model prediction)

save_model_extras.title: Save Model Extras
save_model_extras.description: Output any additional model-specific timeseries data

save_noise_mean.title: Save Noise Mean
save_noise_mean.description: Output the noise means. The noise distribution inferred is the precision of a Gaussian noise source

save_free_energy.title: Save Free Energy
save_free_energy.description: Output the free energy, if calculated.

optfile.title: Options File
optfile.description: File containing additional options, one per line, in the same form as specified on the command line

debug.title: Debug Flag
debug.description: Output large amounts of debug information. ONLY USE WITH VERY SMALL NUMBERS OF VOXELS
